briefdescription.para: Write to USB HID interrupt endpoint buffer.

memberdef.name: hid_int_ep_read

briefdescription.para: Read from USB HID interrupt endpoint buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Max length of data to copy
Number of bytes to copy. If data is NULL and ret_bytes is 0 the number of bytes available in the buffer will be returned.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, negative errno code on fail.
